text: Gustavo Badell (born August 1, 1968 in Montevideo, Uruguay) is a Uruguayan former football player. He played for clubs in Uruguay, Paraguay, Chile and Ecuador. He is the father of international footballer Yamila Badell. ==Teams== * Huracán Buceo 1993 * Nacional 1994-1996 * Emelec 1996-1997 * Huracán Buceo 1997 * Colo-Colo 1998 * Rampla Juniors 1998 * Danubio 1999-2000 * Olimpia 2000 * Huracán Buceo 2001 * Central Español 2002 * Deportivo Colonia 2003-2004 * Rampla Juniors 2005 * Fénix 2006 * Bella Vista 2006-2007 ==Titles== * Colo- Colo 1998 (Chilean Primera División Championship) ==References== ==External links== * Profile at BDFA Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Uruguayan people of Catalan descent Category:Uruguayan footballers Category:Uruguayan expatriate footballers Category:Club Nacional de Football players Category:Central Español players Category:Huracán Buceo players Category:Rampla Juniors players Category:Danubio F.C. players Category:C.A. title: Gustavo Badell (footballer)
